name: Decisions-game
body:
### View Object 1
The first object was created using Articulate Storyline.  The aim of the object is to help students find all the information they need to begin their assessment.

### View Object 2
This object was created to help student understand their assessment task.

### View the [USC Assignment Calculator](http://www.usc.edu.au/learn/current-students/assignment-calculator)
We originally linked to the QUT Assignment Calculator, but then we asked them if they would be willing to share their code.  Unfortunately it was incompatible with our web systems, so we asked the IT and Website teams if they would help us.

### View Object 4
This object helps students find academic sources ad use them in their written assessment task.

### Object 5
This final object is designed to help other academics create their own learning objects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
